name: SEO-Optimized Page & Feature Generator
description: Generate new pages and features following complete SEO, design, and AI optimization standards

actions.prompt:
Create a new page or feature for the Brokeranalysis platform following ALL established standards:

## CREATION REQUIREMENTS

### Page/Feature Details:
- **Type**: {pageType}
- **Name/Title**: {pageName}
- **Target Keywords**: {targetKeywords}
- **Location**: {location}
- **Description**: {description}
- **Special Features**: {specialFeatures}

## MANDATORY IMPLEMENTATION STANDARDS

### 1. SEO OPTIMIZATION
- ✅ Complete metadata with title, description, keywords
- ✅ Open Graph and Twitter Card tags
- ✅ Appropriate JSON-LD structured data (FinancialService/Article/FAQPage)
- ✅ Proper URL structure (kebab-case, <60 chars)
- ✅ Canonical URL implementation
- ✅ H1-H6 heading hierarchy with target keywords
- ✅ Internal linking to relevant broker pages
- ✅ External links to authoritative sources
- ✅ Image optimization with alt text
- ✅ Minimum 800 words for informational content

### 2. DESIGN SYSTEM COMPLIANCE
- ✅ Use predefined typography classes (.text-heading-*, .text-body-*)
- ✅ Implement brand color system and gradients
- ✅ Apply glass morphism card styling (.glass-card, .modern-card)
- ✅ Use proper button variants (.cta-primary, .btn-glass, etc.)
- ✅ Include trust score components where relevant
- ✅ Apply consistent animations (.floating-card, .pulse-glow)
- ✅ Ensure dark theme compatibility
- ✅ Maintain professional, clean, modern aesthetic

### 3. TECHNICAL STANDARDS
- ✅ Proper TypeScript interfaces and types
- ✅ 'use client' directive only when needed
- ✅ @/ import aliases for clean imports
- ✅ cn() utility for conditional styling
- ✅ Next.js Image component with WebP optimization
- ✅ Dynamic imports for code splitting
- ✅ Performance optimization (Core Web Vitals)

### 4. ACCESSIBILITY & UX
- ✅ WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- ✅ Keyboard navigation support
- ✅ Proper ARIA labels and semantic HTML
- ✅ Color contrast ratios (minimum 4.5:1)
- ✅ Focus management and indicators
- ✅ Mobile-first responsive design

### 5. AI & SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION
- ✅ Semantic HTML5 elements
- ✅ Clear information hierarchy
- ✅ Rich snippets and schema markup
- ✅ High-quality, informative content
- ✅ Strong internal linking structure
- ✅ Featured snippet optimization
- ✅ Voice search optimization
- ✅ AI crawler-friendly structure

### 6. BROKER-SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS
- ✅ Trust score integration and explanation
- ✅ Evidence-based claims with sources
- ✅ Regulatory information and disclaimers
- ✅ Broker comparison structured data
- ✅ Financial content compliance
- ✅ Risk disclaimers where appropriate

## DELIVERABLES

Create the following files with complete implementation:

1. **Main Page/Component File**
   - Complete component with all features
   - Proper metadata and structured data
   - SEO-optimized content structure
   - Design system compliance

2. **Type Definitions** (if needed)
   - TypeScript interfaces
   - Component prop types
   - Data structure types

3. **Supporting Components** (if needed)
   - Reusable sub-components
   - UI elements following design system

4. **Mock Data** (if needed)
   - Sample data for development
   - Realistic broker/financial data

## QUALITY ASSURANCE

Ensure the created page/feature:
- ✅ Passes all SEO audits
- ✅ Meets performance benchmarks
- ✅ Follows accessibility standards
- ✅ Maintains design consistency
- ✅ Includes proper error handling
- ✅ Has mobile responsiveness
- ✅ Implements proper loading states
- ✅ Includes analytics tracking

## CONTENT GUIDELINES

- Write compelling, informative content
- Use natural keyword placement (1-2% density)
- Include relevant broker comparisons
- Add trust score explanations
- Provide evidence-based recommendations
- Include user-focused benefits
- Maintain professional tone
- Add call-to-action elements

Create a complete, production-ready implementation that exemplifies the Brokeranalysis brand standards and provides exceptional user experience while maximizing SEO effectiveness.

inputs": [
        {
          "name": "pageType",
          "type": "select",
          "label": "Page/Feature Type",
          "options": [
            "Landing Page",
            "Broker Comparison Page",
            "Country-Specific Broker Page",
            "Trading Strategy Guide",
            "Broker Review Page",
            "FAQ Page",
            "Blog Article",
            "Tool/Calculator",
            "Dashboard Feature",
            "Search Results Page"
          ],
          "required": true
        },
        {
          "name": "pageName",
          "type": "text",
          "label": "Page/Feature Name",
          "required": true,
          "placeholder": "Best Forex Brokers in USA"
        },
        {
          "name": "targetKeywords",
          "type": "text",
          "label": "Primary Target Keywords",
          "required": true,
          "placeholder": "forex brokers usa, best trading platforms, broker comparison"
        },
        {
          "name": "location",
          "type": "text",
          "label": "File Location",
          "required": true,
          "placeholder": "app/brokers/usa/page.tsx"
        },
        {
          "name": "description",
          "type": "textarea",
          "label": "Page Description & Purpose",
          "required": true,
          "placeholder": "Comprehensive guide to the best forex brokers available to US traders, including trust scores, regulatory information, and detailed comparisons."
        },
        {
          "name": "specialFeatures",
          "type": "textarea",
          "label": "Special Features & Requirements",
          "placeholder": "Interactive comparison table, trust score breakdown, regulatory compliance checker, user reviews section"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
